wikipedia_page.main: Joe Blackman (born c. 1984) is an entrepreneur and former CEO of Collection 26 (formerly called Green Ant Events), a luxury event-planning company. He previously sat as a magistrate at the Cardiff Magistrates Courts.

response: *Joe Blackman (born c. 1984), events and entertainment industry entrepreneur
* Joe Blackman – dedicated much of his youth to helping young people start their own businesses

response: *Joe Blackman, entrepreneur, Ambassador of The Princes Trust, CEO of Collection 26
